coreAtributes.clothingAuthorTag: Small engraved text informs you that this set of piercings was made by 'Norin'.
coreAtributes.name: chastity piercing set
coreAtributes.description: A set of piercings designed to be able to be locked, keeping the wearer's vagina tightly shut.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(insert)] various piercings into [npc.her] [npc.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc.vagina] lips, then [npc.verb(thread)] a lock through them, clicking it shut.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(insert)] various piercings into [npc2.namePos] [npc2.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc2.vagina] lips, then [npc.verb(thread)] a lock through them, clicking it shut.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] quickly [npc.verb(insert)] various piercings into [npc2.namePos] [npc2.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc2.vagina] lips, then [npc.verb(force)] a lock through them, clicking it shut.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unlock)] the lock keeping [npc.her] [npc.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc.vagina] lips tightly shut, then [npc.verb(remove)] the various piercings.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unlock)] the lock keeping [npc2.namePos] [npc2.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc2.vagina] lips tightly shut, then [npc.verb(remove)] the various piercings.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unlock)] the lock keeping [npc2.namePos] [npc2.vaginaColourSecondary] [npc2.vagina] lips tightly shut, then roughly [npc.verb(pull)] out the various piercings.
